adapters

Class ClaimAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • adapters.ClaimAdapter

  • public class ClaimAdapter
extends
    This is a Custom array adapter used to display the necessary info for a claim. It should be used when you have to display a list of claim objects, as you would use an ordinary arrayAdapter. Classes it works with: Claim, ClaimStatus Sample use ClaimViewerFragment.claimAdapter = new ClaimAdapter(activity, R.layout.claim_adapter_layout, this.claims);

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        Sets up the details in the custom array elements, including the claim details and an image to describe it's status.
